DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : The primary objective study evaluate postprandial effect low high glycemic index breakfast vascular function , measure central blood pressure , augmentation index pulse wave velocity , sample healthy young adult . The second objective ass postprandial effect low high glycemic index breakfast blood glucose insulin value sample healthy young adult . The third last objective ass postprandial effect low high glycemic index breakfast cognitive performance sample healthy young adult . Design setting : A control crossover clinical trial , subject complete three intervention ( control breakfast , high glycemic index breakfast low glycemic index breakfast ) , washout period one week , whose order determine randomization sequence generate use Randomization.com software ( http : //www.randomization.com ) . Study setting : The study conduct primary care health area Salamanca Research Unit La Alamedilla , belong Spanish Network Preventive Activities Health Promotion ( redIAPP ) Salamanca Institute Biomedical Research ( IBSAL ) . Study population : The subject study population select consecutive sampling primary care clinic urban health center Salamanca ( Spain ) 2015 2016 . As crossover clinical trial , consecutive sampling ensure comparability group .
